Location.Description: You in a secret laboratory of Dr. Hadkin's Research Clinic, a damp basement down a set of creaky dark stairs. There is a sharp, pugnent smell to the air, something strange and biological. There isn't too much down there except a manhole leading to yet deeper, stranger depths, but it's inaccesible due to being flooded with a pink substance leaking out of a large glass tank. Something almost seems to be splashing down in the goo, but what? Or maybe even who?
